profile.title: a little about me ...
aboutText: My life's journey has been about visual expression in all its forms; from classical painting to poster designs to human<->computer interfaces on modern devices. I am essentially an artisan, craft person who thinks and works towards achieving results at scale.

I am Irish and have worked for creative studios in Dublin and London, making the switch from agency life to embed with multi-disciplinary product teams for greater domain expertise and design results. I now live in Atlanta with my wife and son.
profile.practiceText: I've evolved my practices over time: creative graphic design; branding for new companies and tech startups; web design; UX/UI for web apps; Product Design for SaaS. From UX research to UX engineering - I am engaged by it all and continually learning and applying new techniques that bring success.
profile.teamsText: Agile and LeanUX are the core philosophies that guide how I work with teams. I test ideas early, release work regularly, and validate assumptions through quantitative and qualitative methodologies.
profile.outcomesText: Working on e-commerce and software projects enables me to ideate, iterate, learn and leverage design to achieve greater outputs for business and customers. I am motivated by 'outcomes' instead of 'outputs'. A mature Design practice helps achieve business success at scale; far more than only delivering on requests for UI assets.

profile.profilePicCaption: That's me (green arrow over my head) with the team from IgluCruise.com at a digital marketing event in Brighton, UK
profile.galleryCaption: One of my many blessings has been the travel I've done with my wife and son, seeing many coutries across Europe and many States within the US
